alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 1:31PM MST until December 25 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow at times. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches below 6000 feet with upwards of 11 inches across mountains and passes above 6000 feet. Winds gusting to 35 mph at times may produce areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Central Mountains from Stanley south to Picabo, including Galena Summit. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills
